Components of Inability to Secure or Follow a Substantially Gainful Occupation
The
inability to secure or follow a substantially gainful occupation
, as defined in
38 CFR 4.16(b)
, hinges on two components:
economic, as discussed in
M21-1 VIII, Subpart iv, 3.A.2
, and
non-economic, as discussed in
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.A.3
.
